desc: Bot responds with pong if alive
Command used to interact with the minecraft server currently bound to the bot

args.desc: Checks whether the minecraft server is Off, On, Starting up or Shutting down. If the server is on, it will return a list of the player currently on the server.
Returns all the information regarding the server including: Ip-address, Port, Name, Average boot time along with other miscellaneous information about the world such as difficulty.
Give OP privileges to the target using their in-game name

desc: Will shutdown the pc hosting the server and this bot. Will only work if you have elevated privileges.
